actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 96-814.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Committees.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of funds, not to exceed $287,852, for investigations and studies to be conducted by the House Select Committee on Committees. Specifies that $48,400 of such funds are for the reimbursement of computer and computer-related services requested by such committee. Declares that no part of these funds shall be available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject which is being investigated by any other House committee. Terminates the authorization granted by this resolution on April 30, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Committees.
